errorMessages.minLengthInvalid: Minimum length must be 0 or greater
errorMessages.maxLengthInvalid: Maximum length must be 1 or greater
errorMessages.minGreaterThanMax: Minimum length must be less than or equal to maximum length
errorMessages.minValueGreaterThanMax: Minimum value must be less than or equal to maximum value
errorMessages.defaultBelowMin: Default value must be greater than or equal to minimum value
errorMessages.defaultAboveMax: Default value must be less than or equal to maximum value
errorMessages.minDateAfterMax: Minimum date must be before or equal to maximum date
errorMessages.defaultDateBelowMin: Default date must be after or equal to minimum date
errorMessages.defaultDateAboveMax: Default date must be before or equal to maximum date
errorMessages.minRadioOptionsRequired: Radio fields need at least 2 options to choose from
errorMessages.defaultValuesInvalid: Default values must be from the available options

infoMessages.noOptionsAvailable: No options available. Add options first to set default values.
infoMessages.selectFieldToEdit: Select a field to edit its settings
